parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The description of the user group. The description can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host for which you want to create a user group.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host for which you want to create a user group.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: UserGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the user group that you want to create. This name can be a up to 128 characters in length.
